sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react'; import axios from 'axios' class AddUserForm extends Component { constructor() { super() this.handleSubmit = this.handleSubmit.bind(this); this.state = { states: [], dob: "", firstName: "", lastName: "", email: "", password: "", address: "", unit: "", city: "", state: "", zipcode: "", type: "" } } onChange(e) { this.setState({ [e.target.name]: e.target.value }) } handleSubmit(e) { e.preventDefault(); const user = { firstName: this.state.firstName, lastName: this.state.lastName, dob: this.state.dob, email: this.state.email, password: this.state.password, type: this.state.type ? this.state.type : document.getElementById("type").value, contactInformation: [{ address: this.state.address, city: this.state.city, state: this.state.state, zipcode: this.state.zipcode }] } document.getElementById("form-to-clear").reset(); } componentDidMount() { axios.get("http://localhost:8080/getStates").then(response => { const temp = response.data.map(st => { return }) this.setState({ states: temp }) }) } render() { console.log(this.state.firstName) return (
this.onChange(e.target.value)} type="email" name="email" className="form-control w-100" id="email" aria-describedby="emailHelp" placeholder="Enter email" required />
this.onChange(e.target.value)} type="password" name="password" className="form-control w-100" id="password" placeholder="Password" required />
this.onChange} type="text" name="firstName" className="form-control w-100" id="firstName" placeholder="First Name" />
this.setLastName(e.target.value)} type="text" name="lastName" className="form-control w-100" id="lastName" placeholder="Last Name" />
this.setAddress(e.target.value)} type="text" className="form-control" id="inputAddress" name="address" placeholder="1234 Main St" />
this.setUnit(e.target.value)} type="text" className="form-control" id="inputAddress2" name="unit" placeholder="Apartment, studio, or floor" />
this.setDob(e.target.value)} type="date" className="form-control" id="inputAddress2" name="dob" placeholder="Apartment, studio, or floor" />
this.setCity(e.target.value)} type="text" className="form-control" name="city" id="inputCity" />
this.setZipcode(e.target.value)} type="text" name="zipcode" className="form-control" id="inputZip" />

{this.state.message}

); } } export default AddUserForm;
